name: Faster Than You
description:
Simple and fun top-down arcade racer

Simple gameplay with few buttons. Steering, acceleration and brake (but who needs that really).

Lots of sliding, because it's fun!

Crisp, clear graphics

Bunch of unique tracks

Many unique tracks in different environments. Each track can also be raced in reverse. 

1 Power-Up

There is only 1 power-up in the game and it makes you go FASTER! Why would you need anything else?

Ladder of challenges

The main mode  of the game is a ladder containing varied types of challenges, like time limits, perfect lap, good old regular racing and more. Reach higher in the ladder to unlock tracks and vehicles.

Championship mode

Up to 4 players in splitscreen can play a series of tracks in a championship. Score the most points to finish as the champion. Select from all your unlocked tracks and race them in any order you like.

Controls

Gamepad with analog stick and triggers (eg. XBOX 360/ONE) for each player is recommended.
Up to two players on the same keyboard (depending on keyboard type).
Currently the controls are not configurable (this will be fixed) and are:
Keyboard 1: Up/Down/Left/Right , and . (Pause with ESC)
Keyboard 2: R/F/D/G Z and X (Pause with Q)
X360: Left stick/Left trigger/Right triger A and B (Pause with Start)

Development status

Faster Than You is still in development, but you can support our development by buying it early. For a discounted price you will get access to the beta PC-version and all upcoming updates, including the MacOS version when it's released.

Currently the challenge ladder is not available and because of that you only have the first vehicle and some of the tracks. Which is enough to have plenty of fun :)

Roadmap

These are the big features on the roadmap

More tracks
Challenge mode (main mode of the game)
Unlockable tracks
Unlockable vehicles
Better AI
Reconfigurable controls
Performance optimizations
